title: Disney, Racecars, and Redsox
teaser:
A comic attends her sister’s wedding at Disneyland; two  guys try to break the Red Socks curse; the child of two hoarders digs herself out and a young man doesn't let his lack of eyesight restrict his mobility.  Hosted by The Moth’s Curatorial Producer, Meg Bowles.
 
The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.
contentencoded:
Jessi Klein has a wild time at her sister’s Disneyland wedding.
 
Joe Limone is passionate about Boston’s sports teams.
 
Alison Minami is the child of two hoarders.
 
Ryan Knighton loses his sight as a young man, but not his passion for speed.
